mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM USERS ORDER BY userid)a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{pageSize}) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page}-1) * #{pageSize}+1 AND #{page} * #{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET usernm = #{usernm}, pass = #{pass}, reg_dt = #{reg_dt}, alias = #{alias}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, zipcode = #{zipcode} WHERE userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (userid, usernm, pass, alias, addr1, addr2, zipcode, filename, realfilename, reg_dt) VALUES (#{userid}, #{usernm}, #{pass},#{alias}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zipcode},#{filename},#{realfilename}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE userid LIKE %#{userid}%
